(3:02) (No Huddle, Shotgun) 9-T.Romo pass short middle to 82-J.Witten for 15 yards, TOUCHDOWN. Pass complete down the seam in the middle of the end zone. The pass reception puts Witten with more than 9.000 career yards, becoming the second Cowboys player and third tight end in the NFL to surpass 9,000 yards.
5-D.Bailey extra point is GOOD, Center-91-L.Ladouceur, Holder-6-C.Jones.
